Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Greetings,

I have just accepted a position as Assistant Professor in the n=
ewly formed
Department of Informatics at New Jersey Institute of Technology=

<http://njit.edu/> and am looking for a Ph.D. student interested in
studyi=
ng computational creativity and/or digital games starting in Fall
2017. As =
one of Ken Stanley=E2=80=99s former Ph.D. students in computer science at
t=
he University of Central Florida, I have worked extensively with NEAT and
w=
ould be interested in continuing this type of research applied to
creativit=
y and games. More about my research is available at
http://amykhoover.com. =
The university is located in the University Heights
neighborhood of Newark,=
 New Jersey and is only 9 miles (14.5 km) away from
New York City. If you a=
re interested in this position, please email
amy.hoover@... with a CV=
 and one-page research statement. Also please
feel free to contact me with =
any questions.

Best,
Amy

--001a1140373ee76d0e0549a3bd7a
